channel.title: HELP! Its frustrating
channel.description: Well I have followed everything on how to make a server, but my server still isn't online. I portfowarded and everything, but I'm not really sure I did it correctly, because I have a Belkin router. But when I change the client IP to mine, it gives me the error ofJS5. Its getting really frustrating, I've been working on it forever. CAn someone please help me?

item.title: HELP! Its frustrating
item.dc:creator: @_Urban !.::Urban.::!
item.description:
@_Urban wrote:

Do this;

  1. Change the IP to your No-IP Host. Example: (yourservername).no-ip(name you selected)
  2. Right click it and select Add to “Server Name” archive. (make sure you have Winrar downloaded)
  3. Then, after it’s made into a Rar file, you can change the IP in your client to your localhost.
  4. Put up the Rar File (Client) for download, and people should be able to connect.

Read full topic

item.title: HELP! Its frustrating
item.dc:creator: @GfDaniel GfDaniel
item.description:
@GfDaniel wrote:

If I don’t change my client IP, how do other people play?

Read full topic

item.title: HELP! Its frustrating
item.dc:creator: @_Urban !.::Urban.::!
item.description:
@_Urban wrote:

Don’t change Client IP, when you log in, you log in with your Localhost which is 127.0.0.1
To confirm if you have portfowarded correctly or not, use the uTorrent checker.
If you it confirms you may recieve ports, that means you have portfowarded.
Remember to setup a host on No-IP.com

Read full topic
